name: MVC
description: MVC helps with sperating work flows in a project. With the Model for the database structure, Views for the page layouts, and Controller or the routes to control the pages.

name: ORM
description: ORM or Object Relational Mapping allows us to associate our objects in a way that allows us to associate and organize them in a way that allows us to sort data in an organized way.

name: JQuery
description: Jquery is a way to manipulate and adjust DOM elements on the fly using JavaScript and make interactive applications. Though being reaplceed by newer alternitives still serves a valuable purpose.
